text:
hi guys, how do i access the `request_contact.is_logged_in` value in react?
i'm having server render fail when i try to use in inside my hublDataTemplate

`export const hublDataTemplate = ``
  `{% set hublData = {`
      `"isLoggedIn": request_contact.is_logged_in`
    `}`
  `%}`
```
are you trying to access it in the context of a proxied page?

hi <@UAYBXDG4U> i'm not sure about the context provided page.
i just need the value of `request_contact.is_logged_in` inside of my island components.
are you viewing this in the local dev server or live?

the server render failed only happens in live.
when i'm on preview page it doesn't break.

it's giving me this on live page
server render fail/waiting for island-4a147ci1R0 (separate island render, inside)
it only happens when i try to put `request_contact.is_logged_in` inside of hublData
Hey Vincent, do you have a page link with this error?

hi <@U04DLJH3W94>
this is the live page:
<https://staging.jjnet.com.tw/events>
and this is the preview page:
<https://staging.jjnet.com.tw/events?hs_preview=LUdlsmKx-172235766949>

Great,

this was fixed as part of some improvements we're rolling out to CMS React's compatibility with Partial Prerendering :+1:
